    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AudioController
    Controller for converting supported audio files (WAV, FLAC, AAC, OGG) to MP3.
    ConversionHistory
    Represents a single file conversion record to be stored in the database.
    CsvConverter
    Converts CSV files to XLSX format without using external libraries.
    CsvToXlsxController
    Controller for converting CSV files to XLSX format.
    DatabaseManager
    Manages connection to the SQLite database and handles saving/retrieving history records.
    FileUtils
     
    HistoryController
    Controller for managing the conversion history view.
    ImageConverter
    Utility class for converting images between different formats.
    Logger
     
    Main
    Main application class that initializes and displays the main window.
    MainController
    Controller for the main application layout.
    PngJpgController
    Controller for handling PNG â‡„ JPG conversions.
    PngPdfConverter
    Utility class for converting images (PNG or JPG) into PDF documents.
    PngToPdfController
    Controller for converting multiple PNG or JPEG images into a single PDF.
    TextConverter
    Converts plain text (TXT) files into XLSX spreadsheet format without using any third-party libraries like Apache POI.
    TiffController
     
    TxtToXlsxController
    Controller for converting TXT files to XLSX format using a custom converter.
    VideoController
    Controller for handling video conversion logic and UI interaction.
    VideoConverter
    Handles video file conversion by directly invoking FFmpeg using ProcessBuilder.
    WebpController
